text:
[Verse]
Shadows in the night
City lights are bright
Music in the air
Dance without a care

[Verse]
Feet against the ground
Rhythms all around
Heart begins to race
Lost in this embrace

[Chorus]
Midnight dance we're free
Feel the energy
Let the moment last
Living life so fast

[Verse]
Hands up to the sky
Stars are flying by
Laughter in our eyes
Time for no goodbyes

[Bridge]
Forget the world outside
Here we can confide
Let the music guide
Hearts open wide

[Chorus]
Midnight dance we're free
Feel the energy
Let the moment last
Living life so fast
title: Midnight Dance
